DESCRIPTION: After a player or monster attacks, all creatures with #yTargeting take #b2 damage.
Target receives #b15% more damage for each stack of #yBlindsided (up to a maximum of #b4.)
#yBleeding creatures lose HP at the start of their turn, then reduce #yBleeding by half. Whenever you play an Attack, increase #yBleeding by #b1.
ALL enemies become #yStunned. Fades away after an Attack is played or #yTargeting is triggered.
If you have played 4 or more cards this turn, trigger an additional effect.
Simulate playing cards, for use with #ySwift effects.
Target receives #b5% more damage for each stack of #yProxy.
